name: Dodge (itch) (Dwarfish)
description:
Small Red Box enemies are killed with bullets and/or on player contact. These enemies fire bullets too!

Red Circle enemies chase the player and are STUNNED by bullets, they will die after they expire! They can 'bounce' off each other while chasing the player.

WASD keys for movement
Mouse Keys for Teleport/Shoot
The colored cursor is the cooldown/range for teleportation.  Range currently disabled.
Yellow = On cool-down.  Red = Out of range. Green = Ready and In Range (
